Name: A Few of My Favourite Things
Ingredients: 10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet with zesty citrus, rich sherry, cognac and faint herbal Chartreuse.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Dale Bebington at Hawksmoor Air Street, London, England. Dale’s original recipe specifies Martell Cordon Bleu cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of A Few of My Favourite Things contains 142 calories
